entry.title: Flask shorteners extension
entry.content:
Hello guys, it’s been a while since last post, i know, but i’m trying my best to stay this blog updated with the all the stuff that i’m working on these days.

Yesterday i’ve started to code a simple flask extension, called Flask-Shorteners. The idea is to abstract the shortening and expading of a given url using some famous shorteners APIs like Bit.ly and Googl shorteners. This extension is helping me learn Flask, a really nice web microframework for Python. If you like the extension please feel free to contribute.

You can find the source code here: https://github.com/ellisonleao/Flask-Shorteners

See you next post!
